original: intros u l g q p H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold is_lcm in H4. unfold is_lcm. destruct H4 as [H4_1 [H4_2 H4_3]]. split. - apply is_gcd_minus. apply H1. apply H3. - split. + apply divides_minus. * apply H4_1. * apply mult_le_compat. ++ apply H4_2. ++ apply H1. + intros k H_kp H_kq. apply H4_3. * apply divides_mult_inv_l with (p := p). apply H_kp. * apply divides_mult with (k := p). apply H_kq.
